PopupMessages.MSGID_NOUPDATE: No update is available. The auto-update may not have been activated yet.
PopupMessages.MSGID_UPDATEAVAILABLE: An update package is available, do you want to download it?
PopupMessages.MSGID_DOWNLOADSTOPPED: Download is stopped by user. Update is aborted.
PopupMessages.MSGID_CLOSEAPP: is opened. Updater will close it in order to process the installation. Continue?
PopupMessages.MSGID_ABORTORNOT: Do you want to abort update download?
PopupMessages.MSGID_UNZIPFAILED: "Can't unzip: Operation not permitted or decompression failed"
